Recruitment.subtitle: At WBG Technology, we offer a broad platform for development and an excellent team atmosphere. We look forward to your joining.

frontend.title: Front-end Developer
frontend.requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or related fields|Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and other front-end technologies|Experience with React/Vue frameworks|Good teamwork skills

pm.title: Product Manager
pm.requirements: Bachelor's degree or above with 3+ years of relevant experience|Excellent communication and project management skills|Familiar with product development processes|Experience in fluid control or related industries preferred

marketing.title: Marketing Specialist
marketing.requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in Marketing or related fields|Excellent copywriting and communication skills|Familiar with digital marketing and social media operations
marketing.responsibilities: Responsible for company product marketing|Planning and executing marketing activities|Analyzing market trends and competitors

operations.title: Operations Manager
operations.requirements: 3+ years of relevant work experience|Excellent project management skills|Good communication and coordination abilities
operations.responsibilities: Responsible for daily company operations management|Optimizing operational processes to improve efficiency|Coordinating work across departments to ensure goals are met

about.title: About Us
about.description: WBG Technology Co., Ltd. is a professional supplier of vibration reduction and fluid control products, dedicated to creating and supplying innovative, efficient, and energy-saving products that meet customer interests and rapidly changing market demands. We value talent development and look forward to growing together with you.

culture.title: Our Corporate Culture
culture.description1: At WBG, we uphold the concept of "Creating Excellence", pursuing continuous improvement in product quality and customer satisfaction. We have a professional international team providing the highest quality service and solutions for our customers.
culture.description2: We provide employees with an open, equal, and collaborative work environment, encouraging innovation and self-development. By joining us, you will have the opportunity to participate in internationally leading projects, showcase your talents and potential.

0.title: Innovation
0.description: We are committed to continuous innovation in fluid control and vibration reduction, meeting customer needs with advanced technology

1.title: Quality
1.description: Strict ISO9001/ISO14001/ISO45001 certification ensures our products and services meet international standards

2.title: Responsibility
2.description: We value environmental responsibility, providing energy-efficient solutions that reduce resource waste

3.title: Growth
3.description: Providing employees with broad development opportunities and professional training, growing together and creating value

jobList.title: Job Listings
jobList.description: We offer competitive salary packages and comprehensive benefits. We welcome talented professionals from all fields to join our team

teamShowcase.title: Team Showcase
teamShowcase.description: Here, you will work with a group of outstanding colleagues, challenge yourself, and realize your value

ctaSection.title: Join Us, Create the Future Together
ctaSection.description: We look forward to growing with talented and passionate individuals, together making WBG a leader in the industry

Footer.companyDescription: Committed to creating long-term value for customers through cutting-edge temperature control technology, promoting sustainable development in the industry.

copyright.text: Copyright Â© {year} WBG All rights reserved.

0.name: KeenCool
0.description: Hangzhou KeenCool Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading immersion liquid cooling technology enterprise in China, focusing on efficient cooling solutions for data centers, communication base stations, and energy storage scenarios. With proprietary cooling liquid and intelligent control technology, it achieves PUE as low as 1.08, supporting "dual carbon" goals, and collaborates deeply with leading enterprises like State Grid and China Telecom to promote the scale application of liquid cooling technology

1.name: Canatal
1.description: Nanjing Canatal focuses on computer room air conditioning and precision temperature control, providing efficient energy-saving refrigeration solutions. Products include precision air conditioning, chiller units and more, winning global customer trust with innovative technology, stable performance and intelligent services, supporting stable development of data centers, communications and other critical industries.

2.name: Watts
2.description: Founded in the United States in 1874, WATTS is a global leader in water industry solutions, focusing on developing high-quality valves, fittings, and water treatment products. With innovative technology and strict standards, it safeguards water safety for homes and businesses. Known for durability and energy efficiency, its service network covers the globe, committed to providing reliable and efficient water system support for modern living.

3.name: IVCO
3.description: Shanghai IVCO Valve Co., Ltd. is a professional valve manufacturer located in Shanghai Qingpu Industrial Park. Products include nuclear power valves, butterfly valves, ball valves, etc. With ISO9001 and TS certification, multiple patents and high-tech enterprise titles, it focuses on nuclear power, petrochemical and other fields, winning domestic and international customer trust through technology, quality and service.

aboutSection.title: About WBG
aboutSection.paragraph1: Shanghai WBG Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading liquid cooling and HVAC solutions provider, focusing on providing innovative energy-efficient products for intelligent computing centers, data centers, computer room temperature control, and water industry.
aboutSection.paragraph2: With continuous innovation in liquid cooling technology and global business layout (covering China, USA, Europe, and Southeast Asia), the company ensures quality through ISO9001/14001/18001 certification systems, committed to creating long-term value for customers through cutting-edge temperature control technology and promoting sustainable industry development.

section.title: Company Introduction
section.subtitle: INTRODUCTION
section.paragraph1: Shanghai WBG Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading liquid cooling and HVAC solutions provider, focusing on providing innovative energy-efficient products for intelligent computing centers, data centers, computer room temperature control, and water industry.
section.paragraph2: With continuous innovation in liquid cooling technology and global business layout (covering China, USA, Europe, and Southeast Asia), the company ensures quality through ISO9001/14001/18001 certification systems, committed to creating long-term value for customers through cutting-edge temperature control technology and promoting sustainable industry development.

0.title: Water Industry
0.description: Providing energy-efficient products and control solutions related to the water industry, helping customers achieve efficient use of water resources.

1.title: Fluid Control
1.description: Professional fluid control products and solutions, applied to various industrial and commercial scenarios, ensuring efficient system operation.

2.title: Vibration Reduction
2.description: Providing advanced vibration reduction technology and noise reduction solutions, improving the working environment and enhancing system stability.

section.title: Company Vision
section.subtitle: COMPANY VISION
section.paragraph1: Shanghai WBG Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading liquid cooling and HVAC solutions provider, focusing on providing innovative energy-efficient products for intelligent computing centers, data centers, computer room temperature control, and water industry.
section.paragraph2: With continuous innovation in liquid cooling technology and global business layout (covering China, USA, Europe, and Southeast Asia), the company ensures quality through ISO9001/14001/18001 certification systems, committed to creating long-term value for customers through cutting-edge temperature control technology and promoting sustainable industry development.
section.paragraph3: Supplying various products including general valves, electric valves, hydraulic control valves, balance valves, etc., capable of covering various needs of fluid systems.
section.paragraph4: The company has established business branches in Shanghai, Guangzhou, Changsha, Chongqing, Chengdu, Shenyang, Hefei and other places to ensure seamless service for customers.
section.visionStatement: The company's vision is to bring sustained efficiency benefits to customers through high-performance products and services, and to fulfill social responsibility for the benefit of the environment.

0.title: General Valves
0.description: High-quality general valves meeting various fluid control needs, reliable quality and long service life.

1.title: Electric Valves
1.description: Intelligent electric valves, precise control, remote operation, suitable for smart buildings and automation systems.

2.title: Hydraulic Control Valves
2.description: Professional hydraulic control valves for network pressure control, flow regulation and hydraulic balance scenarios.

3.title: Balance Valves
3.description: High-precision balance valves, achieving optimal hydraulic balance, improving energy efficiency and saving energy.
